id.description: Unique identifier for the custom field option within the select field's set of options.

value.description: The display name of the custom field option in Jira.

properties.description: Arbitrary key-value pairs representing additional properties of the custom field option. These properties are searchable via JQL if defined in the descriptor.

config.description: Configuration properties for the custom field option.

scope.description: Defines the scope of the custom field option within different project contexts.

projects2.description: Configuration for the custom field option in specific projects, overriding global settings.

id.description: The ID of the project to which the option's behavior applies.

attributes.description: Configuration attributes for the option in a project context. Defines behavior such as selectability and default value.

global.description: Global configuration for the custom field option. If set, the option is available in all projects.

attributes.description: Configuration attributes for the option in the global context. Defines behavior such as selectability and default value.
DEPRECATED - Reserved for additional configuration attributes if needed.

description: Details of the options for a select list issue field.
